articles.title: Poor Oral Health May Harm Your Heart - Asian Scientist Magazine
articles.description: Research from Japan suggests that people who suffer from periodontitis, a gum infection, could also suffer from poor heart health.
articles.content: AsianScientist (Feb. 09, 2023) Do you brush your teeth at least twice a day, floss daily and get regular dental check-ups? If not, you might be at risk of developing periodontitis, a common infectiou… [+3978 chars]

articles.title: Singapore to host World Aquatics Championships in 2025 - CNA
articles.description: Singapore will be the first Southeast Asian country to host the biennial event, which brings together sports like swimming, water polo and diving.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: Singapore will host the World Aquatics Championships in 2025, making it the first Southeast Asian country to do so, the World Aquatics governing body announced on Thursday (Feb 9).
